title: [K-12] Role Transition and Competency Development Strategies for Remote Education Faculty

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Remote Education Management Experience and Language Education-Related Knowledge
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment considerations, with a focus on applied cases in language education

learning_goals: Explain the five core roles of remote education faculty and diagnose competency gaps by role

Learners can analyze elementary/middle/high school health education survey data (minimum 50 responses) to select three priority areas for developing technology utilization and instructional design competencies and write action plans for each priority with the following criteria: (1) two or more specific implementation methods, (2) stated expected time and resources, (3) one or more evaluation metrics.
Design three pedagogical approaches optimized for mobile environments and apply them to project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
